title: nAdhru dhru (tillAnA)
sahitya:
nAdhru dhru dhIm dhImta tiranA tattaratAni tom dhrudhru dhIm dhIm tanana


anupallavi

  nAdhru tAni tom dhrutAni tanam tana tirana tattara tAni dhru dhiM tananam
jham tarikiTa takaNam tarikiTataka takaNaka takajhaNu dhimi tarikiTataka 
ga  rI  ni  dha  ni  ma  gA  ri  sa  ni  pA  dha  ni


caraNam    vitaraNa guNashIla su-paNDita gAyaka samAja kavijanApta su-hrdaya 
vijayashrI ugra pANDya dhIra shrta janAdhAra sukumra
